name: Get A Job!
description:
New video featuring gameplay!

Be sure to check out our other video here!

"Get A Job!" is a visual novel about a twenty-something college graduate trying to find his place in the world. You have been pressured into going to a job interview by your father whose sole purpose seems to be pushing you down the same path he took. Do you follow in his footsteps and try to make your father proud or do you try to discover your own? The choice is up to you.

  • Player decision affects the outcome of the game
  • Over 20 possible endings
  • Contemporary soundtrack
  • Original Character Sprites
  • May or may not get you kicked out of your next interview
  • Runs well on most potatoes
  • Not a dating simulator

Warning: Contains strong language, crude humor and suggestive themes
